directory.name: src
directory.purpose: The `src` directory houses the source code for a temporary todo application project, including UI components, React hooks, type definitions, utility functions, and asset files.

subdirectories.name: assets
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The directory `src\assets` stores the asset files used by the project.

subdirectories.name: components
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\components`, houses the source code for all the individual UI components of a todo application, including input, item display, filtering, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: hooks
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\hooks` directory stores the React hook source code for a temporary project repository.

subdirectories.name: types
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\types`, stores the type definitions for a source code project.

subdirectories.name: utils
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\utils` directory contains utility functions and resources for a temporary project repository.
